General.Name: Jiangsu Dagang Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Dagang Co., Ltd. operates in the real estate development business in China. It also manufactures computer, communication, and other electronic equipment. The company invests and develops in high-tech, building materials, energy-saving products, and environmental protection projects, as well as engages in real estate sales and leasing business. In addition, the company develops central park, a residential area that integrates elevator garden houses, courtyard villas, double-family villas, superimposed villas, and high-end clubs; and villa communities, as well as offers services, such as dock berthing, loading and unloading, warehousing, water supply, and solid waste disposal for enterprises. Jiangsu Dagang Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Zhenjiang, China.
